button.addFirstUserStory: No stories yet... click to add stories

userStories.text: Click on a User Story Title to see the description

modal.title: Remove member
modal.bodyPart1: Are you sure you want to remove

close.description1: Closing this session removes you and all members.
close.description2: You can download the user stories thereafter.

new.title: New session
new.description: Prepare a new session, invite team members and start estimating

join.title: Join session
join.description: Join an existing session and help your team estimate

reconnect.title: Reconnect to session
reconnect.description: Reconnect to existing session as host

jiraServer.description: You can connect Diveni to your Jira Server. For more information check out our Documentation

jiraCloud.description: You can connect Diveni to your Jira Cloud. For more information check out our Documentation

azureDevOps.description: You can connect Diveni to your Azure Dev Ops organziation. You just need to get yourself a Personal Access Token and add it to the backend

github.description: You can create a connection to your github profile via a Personal Access Token. Just click on log in and paste your personal access token into the input field

gitlab.description: You can create a connection to your gitlab profile via a Personal Access Token. Just click on log in and paste your personal access token into the input field

landing.install: Do you want to install Diveni on your Device?

vote.title: Estimate!
vote.waiting: Waiting for your host to start
vote.hostLeft: Waiting for the host to come back...

mode.title: Select the mode for your User Stories

withoutUS.subtitle: Planning without User Stories
withoutUS.descriptionLine1: You will vote with your selected cards
withoutUS.descriptionLine2: You will not be able to add User Stories once you've started the session

withUS.subtitle: Integrate User Stories in your Poker-Planning
withUS.descriptionLine1: Create your User Stories on the next page
withUS.descriptionLine2: Add title and description to each User Story
withUS.descriptionLine3: Use the CSV-Import to integrate User Stories in your session
withUS.descriptionLine4: First line must contain the field names separated by semicolons: title;description;estimation
withUS.descriptionLine5: You will be able to add and edit User Stories once you've started the session

withIssueTracker.subtitle: Select Jira for your Poker-Planning
withIssueTracker.descriptionLine3: After you click on start session, you will be redirected to the next page to edit your user stories
withIssueTracker.descriptionLine4: You will be able to add and edit User Stories once you've started the session

dialog.description: A new tab will open immediately, please grant access to this application in this tab and enter the verification code here.

cardSet.title: Select a card set and its values

fibonacci.label: Fibonacci
fibonacci.description: Each number is the sum of the two preceding ones

tShirtSizes.label: T-shirt sizes
tShirtSizes.description: Basic T-shirt sizes. Simple and effective

hours.label: Hours
hours.description: Simply hours. Great for sub tasks.

numbers.label: Numbers
numbers.description: Integer numbers. What else do you want?

ownSet.label: Own card set
ownSet.description: Here you can set up your own card

hint.label: Hint
hint.description: In the text field below you can set up your own card set. Every entry is separated by a semicolon (;). Duplicated entries are skipped.

hostVoting.title: Should the host vote as well

button.title: Stories
button.noUserStories: No stories yet... Add a story to start estimating.

messages.memberRemoved: You have been removed from the session by the host
messages.issueTrackerSynchronizeFailed: Failed to synchronize changes with Issue-Tracker
